items.message: This Flood Alert has been removed.  It was issued incorrectly by our automation system because of a data spike at the Bosbury gauge. We continue to monitor the situation.

items.description: River Sankey catchment with St Helens and Warrington
items.message:
Flooding is possible in this area.

Monitor local water levels and weather conditions. Avoid using low lying footpaths or entering areas prone to flooding. Start acting on your flood plan if you have one.

Environment Agency Flood Warning Officers set the river or tidal levels that have triggered this message. During industrial action this message has been automatically issued based on rising river or tidal levels.

items.description: River Ditton catchment including areas around Huyton-with-Roby and Widnes

items.description: Whinney Brook and Dovers Brook at Maghull, around Sefton Lane and the Waste Transfer Station
items.message:
Flooding is expected in this area. This means properties are at risk of flooding.

Please take action to protect yourself and your property and monitor local weather and river conditions. Avoid contact with, walking or driving through flood water. Consider activating any property flood protection products you may have.

Environment Agency Flood Warning Officers set the river or tidal levels that have triggered this message. During industrial action this message has been automatically issued based on rising river or tidal levels.

floodArea.county: Barking and Dagenham, Greater London, Redbridge

items.message: This flood alert was issued as a result of automation but no flooding is expected. The forecast is for showers throughout Saturday 26 August and Sunday 27 August but we do not expect to see any impacts as a result of this rainfall. We will continue to monitor river levels.
